head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COLEMAN, CATHERINE T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COLEMAN, CATHERINE T.

block.p: COLEMAN-Catherine T. On September 24, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Patrick. Loving daughter of Clara and the late James V. Cole. Loving mother of James, Maureen Stamos, Patrick, Kathleen, Michael, John and the late Frances. Dear sister of Mary Corcoran, Frances Fordeliso, Dorothy Maier, Patricia Shipley, James E. Cole and the late Rev. William J. Cole. Also survived by eleven grandchildren. Visitation, Tuesday and Wednesday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM at McLaughlin & Sons Funeral Home, 3rd Ave. at 97th St., Brooklyn. Mass of Christian Burial, Thursday, 10:15 AM, Our Lady of Angels Church.
